author: onofre
msg: The ErrorWindow displaying while catching exception doesn't work in case of RuntimeException (Echo2 always invalidates the user session).
For now, I log in error what happens exactly.

Since the echo2-2.0.1.test3 rev 716, we have a new class nextapp.echo2.app.RuntimeExceptionCallback to catch Runtime exception and make actions. I need to wait that this class is released in a major version of echo2.
